data.eml:eml: Simoponefisheri sp. n., a new species of Dorylinae ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from China, with an illustrated key to the S. grandidieri-group species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Zhilin, Chen, Yazhen, Zhou, Shanyi (2019): Simoponefisheri sp. n., a new species of Dorylinae ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from China, with an illustrated key to the S. grandidieri-group species. ZooKeys 838: 21-33, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.838.29465, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.838.29465
